imagemapedit-desc: Description message for the ImageMapEdit extension.
imagemapedit-bottomleft: Label for '{{msg-mw|imagemapedit-bottomleft}}' position option for the info link.
imagemapedit-bottomright: Label for '{{msg-mw|imagemapedit-bottomright}}' position option for the info link.
imagemapedit-circle: Label for creating a circle area.
imagemapedit-circlechoose1: Instruction for selecting the center of a circle.
imagemapedit-circlechoose2: Instruction for selecting the radius of a circle.
imagemapedit-deletearea: Button text to delete the currently selected area.
imagemapedit-deletecoordinates: Button text to delete all coordinates of a polygon.
imagemapedit-display-interface: Button text for displaying the ImageMapEdit interface on the description page of an image.
imagemapedit-error-imagenotfound: Error message when the image cannot be found on the page.
imagemapedit-hidetextbox: Button text to hide the import text box.
imagemapedit-imagedescription: Label for the image description input field.
imagemapedit-import: Button text to perform the import action.
imagemapedit-infolinkposition: Label for the group of radio buttons controlling info link position.
imagemapedit-linktarget: Label for the link target input field.
imagemapedit-linktitle: Label for the link title input field.
imagemapedit-nolink: Label for '{{msg-mw|imagemapedit-nolink}}' position option for the info link.
imagemapedit-optional: Text indicating a field is optional.
imagemapedit-poly: Label for creating a polygon area.
imagemapedit-polychoose: Instruction for adding points to a polygon.
imagemapedit-position: Label for X, Y position inputs (e.g., for circle center).
imagemapedit-radius: Label for the radius input of a circle.
imagemapedit-rect: Label for creating a rectangle area. 'rect' is the shape type.
imagemapedit-rectbottom: Label for the bottom coordinate of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-rectchoose1: Instruction for selecting top-left corner of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-rectchoose2: Instruction for selecting bottom-right corner of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-rectleft: Label for the left coordinate of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-rectright: Label for the right coordinate of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-recttop: Label for the top coordinate of a rectangle.
imagemapedit-showtextbox: Button text to show the import text box.
imagemapedit-topleft: Label for '{{msg-mw|imagemapedit-topleft}}' position option for the info link.
imagemapedit-topright: Label for '{{msg-mw|imagemapedit-topright}}' position option for the info link.
